name: sessionInvalidate
description: Clears session scope and makes the current session identifiers no longer valid. This function does not invalidate J2EE sessions, only CF sessions (CFID/CFToken)

links.title: sessionInvalidate for J2EE Sessions
links.description: Code example for invalidating the j2ee session using the Java Servlet API.

links.title: sessionInvalidate Backport
links.description: This backport allows you to invalidate sessions on older versions of CF (CF9 and below)
